resources.string: Rwizi, like most African hotels I have stayed in, gives you about what you pay for....
We offer generously proportioned apartments, all of which feature: seating area, an en-suite bathroom, terrace or balcony, private kitchen...
With a distinctive comfort for both ordinary and VIP, Signature boasts of features such as Wide Screens for football lovers....
With convenient parking space and room for hosting events like birthday parties and corporate meetings, Club Vegas has renowned sound systems.

The oldest club in town dating back to the 1990s, is the most popular club. Housed in a storeyed building, the club is a true leisure facility
